document.title: Introduction
document.paragraph:
1Introduction There are a lot of properties of EiffelStudio that may be changed by the user. This section will present them, following the classification that can be found in the
../10_overview.xml preferences window . If you open this window, you will see that properties are distributed in three categories:
10_global_preferences.xml Global preferences : This category contains non graphical preferences that are not specific to a tool in EiffelStudio.
20_tools/index.xml Tools : This category gathers preferences associated to a particular tool in EiffelStudio.
30_graphical_elements/index.xml Graphical elements : In this category, you will find the customizable properties of the graphical interface.
